DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Safety Study PF-04802540 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Males female nonchildbearing capacity age 21 55 year inclusive screening . Body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 body weight > 45 kg . Healthy determine investigator basis screen evaluation . Use prescription nonprescription drug Any condition possibly affect drug absorption
